Segment length


In order to decide what the optimal segment length is for the green light we measured the average waiting time in the junction over time.

In order to simulate the amount of cars entering the junction we used poisson distribution and we repeated the measurements for different values of lambda in the distribution.

The results are shown here in the graphs below.

the last 2000 time points.
